name: BuzzwordKing
0:
”Alexa, ask Buzzword King for a new buzzphrase.”
”Alexa, ask Buzzword King for a new buzzword.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: buzzword king
des: The Buzzword King helps you when you need to sound like you are a true, paradigm-shifting, out-of-the-box-thinking, business thought-leader. Just ask for a new buzz word or buzz phrase to spice up any presentation or even a hallway conversation with the kind of business-speak we love to laugh about. Just ask Buzzword King for a new phrase or word.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
